html:
Roles, voice types, premiere cast
Role Voice type Premiere cast, 10 October 1919[3]
Conductor: Franz Schalk
The Emperor (Der Kaiser) tenor
The Empress (Die Kaiserin), Keikobad's daughter high dramatic soprano
The Nurse (Die Amme), her guardian dramatic mezzo-soprano
Barak, the Dyer (Barak, der Färber) bass-baritone
The Dyer's Wife (Die Färberin) dramatic soprano
The One-eyed Man (Der Einäugige), Barak's brother high bass
The One-Armed Man (Der Einarmige), Barak's brother bass
The Hunchback (Der Bucklige), Barak's brother high tenor
The Messenger of Keikobad (Geisterbote) high baritone
The Voice of a Falcon (Die Stimme des Falken) soprano
The Apparition of a Youth (Die Erscheinung eines Jünglings) high tenor
The Guardian of the Threshold (Der Hüter der Schwelle des Tempels) soprano
A Voice From Above (Stimme von oben) contralto
Voices of Six Unborn Children, Voices of Three Town Watchmen, Servants of the Empress, other children and beggar-children, spirit-servants and spirit-voices
